00035 KitAOCelListener::KitAOCelListener() {
00036   init();
00037   // explain the output
00038   addHeaderComment("reagent_version legend:");
00039   addHeaderComment("  Unknown==0");
00040   addHeaderComment("  Kit_A==1");
00041   addHeaderComment("  Kit_O==2");
00042   addHeaderComment("");
00043   //
00044   declareMetric("reagent_version",ChipSummary::Metric::Integer);
00045   declareMetric("reagent_discrimination_value",ChipSummary::Metric::Double,6);
00046   m_layout = NULL;
00047   m_return_kit_id = 0;
00048   m_return_kit_value = 0;
00049 }
00050 
00051 KitAOCelListener::~KitAOCelListener() {
00052   clear();
00053 }

00057 void KitAOCelListener::init() {
00058   m_db=NULL;
00059   //
00060   m_exprAnalysisString="quant-norm.sketch=50000";
00061 }
00062 
00063 void KitAOCelListener::clear() {
00064   //m_db.clear();
00065 }

00068   m_db=db;

00071   m_layout=layout;

00074 void KitAOCelListener::newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel) {
00075   int chipIx=getNextChipIdx();
00076 
00077   //
00078   m_celFileName=cel->GetFileName();
00079   computeKitAO();
00080 
00081   //
00082   setMetric(chipIx,"reagent_version",m_return_kit_id);
00083   setMetric(chipIx,"reagent_discrimination_value",m_return_kit_value);
00084 
00085   //
00086   setValid(true);
00087 }
00088 
00089 double KitAOCelListener::getClassiferAValue() const {
00090   APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_db!=NULL,"m_db is NULL");
00091   return m_db->getClassiferAValue();
00092 }
00093 double KitAOCelListener::getClassiferOValue() const {
00094   APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_db!=NULL,"m_db is NULL");
00095   return m_db->getClassiferOValue();
00096 }

00098 // Again, like the  we only have the celfile and no
00099 void KitAOCelListener::computeKitAO() {
00100   //
00101   //printf("KitAOCelListener::computeKitAO()...\n");
00102 
00103   // check our pointers are valid.
00104   APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_db!=NULL,"internal error");
00105   APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_layout!=NULL,"internal error");
00106 
00107   APT_ERR_ASSERT(m_sketchFileName!="","a sketch is required.");
00108   //////////
00109 
00110   ChipStreamFactory chipStreamFactory;
00111   if (m_sketchFileName!="") {
00112     chipStreamFactory.readTargetSketchFromFile(m_sketchFileName);
00113   }
00114   ChipStream* chipStream=NULL;
00115   std::string junk;
00116   chipStream=chipStreamFactory.chipStreamForString(m_exprAnalysisString,*m_layout,junk);
00117 
00118   //
00119   int probeCount=m_layout->getProbeCount();
00120   std::vector<int> dummy_order(probeCount);
00121   for (int i = 0; i < probeCount; i++) {
00122     dummy_order[i] = i;
00123   }
00124 
00125   std::vector<std::string> celFileNames;
00126   celFileNames.push_back(m_celFileName);
00127   //
00128   SparseMart sparseMart = SparseMart(dummy_order,celFileNames,true);
00129   //
00130   CelReader celReader;
00131   celReader.setFiles(celFileNames);
00132   celReader.registerStream(chipStream);
00133   celReader.registerIntensityMart(&sparseMart);
00134 
00135   celReader.readFiles();
00136 
00137   //////////
00138 
00139   // reset the return info to initial values.
00140   m_return_kit_id=-1;
00141   m_return_kit_value=0.0;
00142 
00143   KitAODbEntry* kitao_entry;
00144 
00145   //
00146   double total_signal_size=0.0;
00147   ProbeListPacked probeset;
00148   std::string probeset_name;
00149   double probeset_signal_size;
00150   std::vector<int> probeset_probeids;
00151   //
00152   double probe_intensity_ch0;
00153   double probe_intensity_ch1;
00154   int probe_id;
00155 
00156   //
00157   total_signal_size=0.0;
00158   std::vector<double> log2vals;
00159 
00160   double log2=log(2.0);
00161   int missing_probe_count=0;
00162 
00163   // loop over the probesets on this chip.
00164   for (KitAODb::name2entry_iter_t entry_i=m_db->m_name2entry.begin();
00165        entry_i!=m_db->m_name2entry.end();
00166        entry_i++) {
00167     //
00168     probeset_name=entry_i->first;
00169     kitao_entry=entry_i->second;
00170 
00171     //printf("probeset: '%s': \n",probeset_name.c_str());
00172 
00173     //
00174     ProbeListPacked probeset = m_layout->getProbeListByName(probeset_name);
00175     if (probeset.isNull()) {
00176       missing_probe_count++;
00177       Verbose::out(1,"KitAOCelListener::computeKitAO(): didnt find probeset '"
00178                    +probeset_name+"' in layout.");
00179       continue;
00180     }
00181 
00182     // We want just the first block of probesets.
00183     // the second channel should be on the second block.
00184     probeset_probeids.clear();
00185     probeset.get_probeIdsForBlock(0,probeset_probeids);
00186 
00187     probeset_signal_size=0.0;
00188     log2vals.clear();
00189     for (int p_idx=0;p_idx<probeset_probeids.size();p_idx++) {
00190       probe_id=probeset_probeids[p_idx];
00191       probe_intensity_ch0=chipStream->getTransformedIntensity(probe_id,0,0);
00192       probe_intensity_ch1=chipStream->getTransformedIntensity(probe_id,0,1);
00193       //
00194       //printf("%d=%.10f/%.10f \n",probe_id,probe_intensity_ch0,probe_intensity_ch1);
00195       double log2val=(log(probe_intensity_ch0+probe_intensity_ch1)/log2/2.0);
00196       log2vals.push_back(log2val);
00197 
00198       // probeset_id probe_id chan0 chan1 log2.A.B
00199 //      printf("%s\t%d\t%f\t%f\t%f\n",
00200 //             probeset_name.c_str(),probe_id,
00201 //             probe_intensity_ch0,probe_intensity_ch1,
00202 //             log2val);
00203     }
00204 
00205     // pick out the median
00206     if (log2vals.size()==0) {
00207       APT_ERR_ABORT("Probeset '"+probeset_name+"' has 0 probeids.");
00208     }
00209     std::sort(log2vals.begin(),log2vals.end());
00210     double median_log2val;
00211     int median_idx=(log2vals.size()-1)/2;
00212     if (log2vals.size()==1) {
00213       median_log2val=log2vals[0];
00214     }
00215     else if ((log2vals.size()%2)==1) {
00216       median_log2val=log2vals[median_idx];
00217     }
00218     else {
00219       median_log2val=(log2vals[median_idx]+log2vals[median_idx+1])/2.0;
00220     }
00221 
00222     // a Format to compare with Johnathans R values.
00223     //
00224     // printf(" raw med_log=%.10f",median_log2val);
00225     // printf(" means=%.10f ",kitao_entry->m_means);
00226     // printf(" PC1=%.10f ",kitao_entry->m_pc1);
00227     // probeset_signal_size has the sum of probes log2(A+B)/2.0,
00228     // Now subtract the mean and multiply by PC1.
00229     probeset_signal_size=(median_log2val-kitao_entry->m_means)*kitao_entry->m_pc1;
00230     // printf(" adj ss=%f",probeset_signal_size);
00231     // Add this signal_size to the total for this chip.
00232     total_signal_size+=probeset_signal_size;
00233     // printf(" total=%.10f",total_signal_size);
00234     // printf("\n");
00235   }
00236 
00237   // now do the abort.
00238   if (missing_probe_count!=0) {
00239     APT_ERR_ABORT("KitAOCelListener.cpp: "+ToStr(missing_probe_count)+" probes missing.");
00240   }
00241   
00242   // now classify this cel file.
00243   m_return_kit_value=total_signal_size;
00244   //
00245   double classifierAValue=getClassiferAValue();
00246   Verbose::out(1,"KitAOCelListener: getClassiferCutoffAValue()=="+ToStr(classifierAValue));
00247   double classifierOValue=getClassiferOValue();
00248   Verbose::out(1,"KitAOCelListener: getClassiferCutoffOValue()=="+ToStr(classifierOValue));
00249 
00250   APT_ERR_ASSERT(classifierAValue<classifierOValue,"A-Value must be less than O-Value.");
00251   
00252   if (total_signal_size<=classifierAValue) {
00253     m_return_kit_id=KIT_A;
00254   }
00255   else if (total_signal_size>=classifierOValue) {
00256     m_return_kit_id=KIT_O;
00257   }
00258   else {
00259     m_return_kit_id=KIT_UNKNOWN;
00260   }
00261 
00262   // clean up resources.
00263   delete chipStream;
00264 
00265   //printf("KitAOCelListener: id=%d val=%0.6f\n",m_return_kit_id,m_return_kit_value);
00266 }
Generated on Tue Jul 15 2014 10:37:35 for Affymetrix Power Tools by  1.7.1
